title: Problem-Solving Competency Enhancement Course for Adult Learners Using Clickers

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Problem-Solving Strategies and Elementary-Level Knowledge of Language Education
context.additional_context: A course focused on solving language education field problems for pre-service or in-service teachers, conducted in an environment where smartphones are available but PCs are not

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real-world language education cases to derive problem-solving strategies in real time.
Learners can engage in collaborative problem-solving processes with peers via clicker-based discussions with 80% or higher participation.
Learners can organize problem-solving outcomes into a digital portfolio and submit them for project-based assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
